description: Ready-to-run LangGraph Studio input examples for supervisor flow debugging.

examples.title: Direct weather query (Hjo)
examples.goal: Verify action/weather routing and weather tool selection.

messages.content: Kan du kolla hur vadret ar i Hjo?

expected_signals: call_agent requested_agent should remain weather (no selected_agents_lock->knowledge)
weather tool family should be selected (e.g. smhi_weather)

examples.title: Direct traffic disruption query (E4, Goteborg)
examples.goal: Verify action/trafik routing and trafik tool family.

messages.content: Kan du kolla om det finns nagra trafikstorningar pa E4 i Goteborg?

expected_signals: selected_agents should include trafik (or action with trafik tools)
trafik tool family should be selected

examples.title: Compare followup that shifts to weather task
examples.goal: Verify cross-workflow behavior after compare: fresh task should not be forced to knowledge.

messages.content: Kort jamforelse: bada ar starka men har olika styrkor.
Kan du kolla hur vadret ar i Hjo?

expected_signals: weather tool family should be reachable

examples.title: Topic shift from statistics to marketplace
examples.goal: Verify that retrieval pivots when user intent changes across workflow boundaries.

messages.content: Arbetslosheten i Malmo ligger pa X procent.
Byter amne: kan du hitta en begagnad elcykel pa Blocket i Malmo?

expected_signals: marketplace tool family should be selected

examples.title: Filesystem task in sandbox
examples.goal: Verify code/sandbox hard lock and sandbox tool priority.

messages.content: Lista filer i /workspace/.artifacts och lasa senaste json-filen.

expected_signals: filesystem_hard_lock should keep execution on code agent
